comment._content: Frederick R. Coudert of New York, was retained as a special assistant attorney general in 1913, see Bismarck daily tribune., August 14, 1913, Page 1

comment._content: Thanks so much for your research B-59. We'll fill in the name, and narrow the date range the next time we update the record.
